dataList.content: As the futile conversations reached an end, the bus lazily pulled to a stop.
We'd arrived...in front of a building so tall that it would take a while to count the floors.
A few shrank down as if intimidated (I understood Sinclair being one, but Heathcliff and Ishmael also seemed to be pressured.)...
A few looked around with curious eyes...
And some others walked with poise like they knew they deserve a royal treatment.
Fuhu, I guess we've earned some renown. We're finally being invited to places regular people would live.
Let me make this clear... If the request and the reward's a load of tosh like the last time, I'm out.
Heathcliff ground his teeth, whether by Hong Lu's words or due to memories of what we got into last time we were here.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Ah, you're a little late as expected.
<As expected?>
That man is...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: It's a pleasure to meet you again. I want you to know that this is my heartfelt sentiment and not a formality.
A familiar face I never expected to see again greeted us.
...I'm out. Told you I'm not dealing with this.
<Give it a moment! Let's at least hear what he has to say, okay?>
Let go! Do you even get how it feels to have nightmares about doing tango with raw chickens? Eh?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: To tell you the true, my last request was a test to measure your competence.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: And you passed with flying colors. Congratulations. I mean this one as well.
Who are you to test and grade us?! You-

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: That's of course-
That's of course at the discretion of Mister Samjo, my shrewd secretary. So you must be...from Limbus Company.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Pleasure to meet you, I'm Dongrang. Heard a lot about you from Samjo. It almost made me a fan.
Fan??? Didst thou say just now that we have earned thy adoration?
It's just flattery, Don Quixote...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: If I'm being honest... The test wasn't my idea. I mean, you aren't lab chickens or anything, you deserve better than involuntary tests.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Indeed, it was my suggestion.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I had reason to, since this "Limbus Company" is a little-known firm that could or could not be newly established.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: We couldn't take the risk of entrusting this unknown organization with a request on Mr. Dongrang's words alone.
Ahem... So, that means you're requesting us...
Ishmael asked for a confirmation, her face seeming rather proud.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Of course. Because, you are...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Ah, why don't I show you to my lab? There are many fun things to see.
<Changing the subject so shamelessly is only gonna bother us more...>

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Sorry? Are you really going to take these people to your laboratory?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Why not? They passed your test, didn't they, Samjo.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: And if they've got the skills to take down what they called an 'Abnormality' as we saw today...
Aha~ You have heard? Traces of heroic deeds indeed make themselves known to the masses in no time! Fufu...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Haha, that's a fun way to put it.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Ah, and you must be...Dante, the manager, yes? Can we speak for a moment?
Faust tried to say something to Dongrang, but he and Samjo dragged me far away by the time she stepped forward.
